start.greet_msg:
You are trapped in the depths of your system's terminal filled with different
environemtns and terrains. Your job is to escape, but it will not be easy. The
labryinth that is your system's terminal is filled with scary bugs, strange
creatures, and dangerous traps. Throughout your journey you will find weapons
and goods to arm yourself. However, even armed, you are not safe from the
choices you make.

option1.no: You decide to not escape your system's terminal. You survive for 3 days and starve to death since there is no food in your computer. GAME OVER
